summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 3 new StudySage features: YouTube Summarizer, Quiz System, and Flashcards with spaced repetition. All new features working excellently with AI integration via Gemini API.

flaky_endpoints.workaround: Existing feature - not related to new functionality

passed_tests: YouTube Summarizer - URL input and AI video summarization (3.9s response time)
YouTube Summarizer - Summary display with title, thumbnail, key points, timestamps
YouTube Summarizer - Export to PDF functionality
YouTube Summarizer - History sidebar with previous summaries
Quiz System - AI quiz generation for Binary Search Trees topic (11.4s response time)
Quiz System - Multiple choice question display with 4 options
Quiz System - Question navigation (Next/Previous buttons)
Quiz System - Answer selection with radio buttons
Quiz System - Quiz submission and results calculation
Quiz System - Quiz history tracking
Flashcards System - AI flashcard generation for Operating System Deadlocks (7.0s response time)
Flashcards System - Deck management and card storage
Flashcards System - Manual card addition functionality
Flashcards System - Spaced repetition review system
Flashcards System - Card deletion and deck deletion
Navigation between all new pages (YouTube, Quiz, Flashcards)
Authentication integration with all new features
Backend API endpoints for all new features (31/32 tests passed)
Gemini AI integration working across all features
Database persistence for summaries, quizzes, and flashcards

success_percentage.backend: 96.9% (31/32 tests passed - 1 timeout on existing feature)
